20110118190004.000|20110118190005.000|CC1|THE TONE OF THE DEBATE UP HERE  
20110118190005.000|20110118190007.000|CC1|ON CAPITOL HILL IN REGARDS TO   
20110118190007.000|20110118190008.000|CC1|THE HEALTH CARE ISSUE.          
20110118190008.000|20110118190009.000|CC1|AS YOU KNOW, THIS IS ONE OF THE 
20110118190009.000|20110118190012.000|CC1|MOST CONTENTIOUS ISSUES THAT HAS
20110118190012.000|20110118190013.000|CC1|EVER COME THROUGH WASHINGTON    
20110118190013.000|20110118190014.000|CC1|WITH BOTH SIDES EMPLOYING A LOT 
20110118190014.000|20110118190017.000|CC1|OF HEATED RHETORIC, BACK IN     
20110118190017.000|20110118190019.000|CC1|MARCH THERE WAS A LOT OF KILLING
20110118190019.000|20110118190021.000|CC1|AND DEATH ANALOGIES FOR THE     
20110118190021.000|20110118190022.000|CC1|LEGISLATION, REPUBLICANS SAYING 
20110118190022.000|20110118190024.000|CC1|GRANDMA WOULD HAVE TO GO BEFORE 
20110118190024.000|20110118190025.000|CC1|A DEATH PANEL AND DEMOCRATS     
20110118190025.000|20110118190027.000|CC1|SAYING REPUBLICAN SOLUTION TO   
20110118190027.000|20110118190028.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE WAS LET PATIENTS    
20110118190028.000|20110118190028.000|CC1|DIE.                            
20110118190028.000|20110118190030.000|CC1|THERE IS A REAL MOVE TO GO AWAY 
20110118190030.000|20110118190031.000|CC1|FROM THAT TYPE OF LANGUAGE IN   
20110118190031.000|20110118190033.000|CC1|LIGHT OF WHAT HAPPENED IN       
20110118190033.000|20110118190033.000|CC1|ARIZONA.                        
20110118190033.000|20110118190035.000|CC1|MUCH MORE SHALL WE SAY ABOUT THE
20110118190035.000|20110118190037.000|CC1|SUBSTANCE AND MERIT TO THE      
20110118190037.000|20110118190037.000|CC1|DEBATE.                         
20110118190037.000|20110118190039.000|CC1|MINORITY WHIP STENY HOYER SAID  
20110118190039.000|20110118190040.000|CC1|THE FOLLOWING, QUOTE, MY HOPE IS
20110118190040.000|20110118190042.000|CC1|THEY'LL DEAL WITH THE ISSUES ON 
20110118190042.000|20110118190043.000|CC1|THE MERITS WITH RESPECT TO THOSE
20110118190043.000|20110118190046.000|CC1|WITH CONTRARY VIEWS.            
20110118190046.000|20110118190047.000|CC1|ESSENTIALLY, REAL RESPECTFUL    
20110118190047.000|20110118190048.000|CC1|TONE GOING FORWARD AND THAT'S   
20110118190048.000|20110118190050.000|CC1|WHAT WE EXPECT TO HEAR ON       
20110118190050.000|20110118190051.000|CC1|CAPITOL HILL.                   
20110118190051.000|20110118190052.000|CC1|THAT BEING SAID, RICHARD,       
20110118190052.000|20110118190054.000|CC1|REMEMBER THERE ARE 435 MEMBERS, 
20110118190054.000|20110118190056.000|CC1|THERE IS 7 HOURS OF DEBATE      
20110118190056.000|20110118190057.000|CC1|SCHEDULED.                      
20110118190057.000|20110118190058.000|CC1|SO THERE IS ALWAYS A CHANCE THAT
20110118190058.000|20110118190059.000|CC1|SOMEBODY WILL GET TOO EXCITED   
20110118190059.000|20110118190101.000|CC1|AND SAY THINGS THAT ARE SORT OF 
20110118190101.000|20110118190103.000|CC1|OFF THE MARK, IF YOU WILL, NOT  
20110118190103.000|20110118190105.000|CC1|PART OF USUAL PARLIAMENTARY     
20110118190105.000|20110118190107.000|CC1|RESPECTFUL DEBATE.              
20110118190107.000|20110118190108.000|CC1|THAT IS THE BIG FEAR THAT       
20110118190108.000|20110118190111.000|CC1|LEADERS ON BOTH SIDES HAVE.     
20110118190111.000|20110118190112.000|CC1|THEY DON'T WANT THEIR SIDE TO BE
20110118190112.000|20110118190115.000|CC1|THE FIRST ONE TO SAY SOMETHING  
20110118190115.000|20110118190117.000|CC1|INFLAMMATORY ON AN ISSUE WHICH  
20110118190117.000|20110118190119.000|CC1|IS DIVISIVE AND HAS POLARIZED SO
20110118190119.000|20110118190120.000|CC1|MUCH.                           
20110118190120.000|20110118190122.000|CC1|>> AS WE START TO SEE SOME LIVE 
20110118190122.000|20110118190124.000|CC1|PICTURES HERE FROM THE HOUSE

20110118190141.000|20110118190143.000|CC1|IS A REPEAL OF THE BILL PASSED  
20110118190143.000|20110118190143.000|CC1|THROUGH THE HOUSE OF

20110118190146.000|20110118190147.000|CC1|BECAUSE IN THE HOUSE THE PARTY

20110118190151.000|20110118190152.000|CC1|IF THEIR MEMBERS STAY TOGETHER

20110118190625.000|20110118190626.000|CC1|CONNECTICUT, FOR US.            
20110118190626.000|20110118190627.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GOOD AFTERNOON.    
20110118190627.000|20110118190628.000|CC1|HERE IN HARTFORD, IT'S FREEZING 
20110118190628.000|20110118190630.000|CC1|RAIN.                           
20110118190630.000|20110118190631.000|CC1|TEMPERATURE, 26 DEGREES.        
20110118190631.000|20110118190632.000|CC1|WE STARTED OFF EARLY BEFORE     
20110118190632.000|20110118190634.000|CC1|SUNRISE WITH A COUPLE OF INCHES 
20110118190634.000|20110118190636.000|CC1|OF SNOW IT WENT TO SLEET, NOW   
20110118190636.000|20110118190636.000|CC1|FREEZING RAIN.                  
20110118190636.000|20110118190638.000|CC1|THAT'S BASICALLY WHAT WE HAVE   
20110118190638.000|20110118190640.000|CC1|ACROSS UPSTATE NEW YORK, LOWER  
20110118190640.000|20110118190646.000|CC1|HUDSON VALLEY, POUGHKEEPSIE,    
20110118190646.000|20110118190649.000|CC1|ALBANY, HAHARTFORD, WORCESTER.  
20110118190649.000|20110118190651.000|CC1|NEW YORK CITY SAFELY ABOVE      
20110118190651.000|20110118190652.000|CC1|FREEZING, BUT 40s AT KENNEDY.   
20110118190652.000|20110118190653.000|CC1|DAMAGE IS DONE.                 
20110118190653.000|20110118190656.000|CC1|IT'S RAINING AT ALL THREE NEW   
20110118190656.000|20110118190656.000|CC1|YORK AIRPORTS.                  
20110118190656.000|20110118190659.000|CC1|DELAY AS THE NEWARK AND         
20110118190659.000|20110118190700.000|CC1|LaGUARDIA OVER 90 MINUTES.      
20110118190700.000|20110118190702.000|CC1|LOGAN AND BOSTON DELAYS 3 1/2   
20110118190702.000|20110118190703.000|CC1|HOURS PLUS BECAUSE OF THE SNOW  
20110118190703.000|20110118190705.000|CC1|AND THE WET SNOW.               
20110118190705.000|20110118190706.000|CC1|NOT ONLY YOU'VE GOT THE WEATHER 
20110118190706.000|20110118190708.000|CC1|BUT FIGURE IN THE MASSIVE       
20110118190708.000|20110118190710.000|CC1|AMOUNTS OF TIME IT TAKES FOR THE
20110118190710.000|20110118190711.000|CC1|DE-ICE ICING BECAUSE THEY'VE GOT
20110118190711.000|20110118190713.000|CC1|TO GET PLANES THROUGH, RESTOCK

20110118190716.000|20110118190718.000|CC1|HARTFORD, ROADS SLUSHY.         
20110118190718.000|20110118190721.000|CC1|LOOK AT THIS, IT'S LIKE DIRTY   
20110118190721.000|20110118190721.000|CC1|SLUSH.                          
20110118190721.000|20110118190724.000|CC1|YOU NEED A FRESH LAYER OF SNOW

20110118191325.000|20110118191327.000|CC1|PROGRAM AND LIKELY BE THERE FOR

20110118191328.000|20110118191329.000|CC1|BUT HER PROGRESS HAS JUST BEEN

20110118191335.000|20110118191337.000|CC1|MINOR SURGERY, INCLUDING TAKING 
20110118191337.000|20110118191339.000|CC1|OUT BONE FRAGMENTS FROM HER

20110118191341.000|20110118191342.000|CC1|THEY ALSO TOOK OUT HER BREATHING
20110118191342.000|20110118191344.000|CC1|TUBE FROM HER MOUTH AND

20110118191346.000|20110118191348.000|CC1|FREED HER FROM A VENTILATOR.    
20110118191348.000|20110118191350.000|CC1|AS YOU MENTIONED, HER HUSBAND,  
20110118191350.000|20110118191352.000|CC1|MARK KELLY, HAS BEEN CONSTANTLY 
20110118191352.000|20110118191355.000|CC1|BY HER SIDE, HOLDING HER HAND,  
20110118191355.000|20110118191356.000|CC1|SUPPORTING HER THROUGH THIS     
20110118191356.000|20110118191359.000|CC1|PROCESS AND HE SAYSED, BASED ON

20110118194025.000|20110118194027.000|CC1|THE SITUATION, OR COLLEGES?     
20110118194027.000|20110118194027.000|CC1|WHAT HAVE YOU SEEN?             
20110118194027.000|20110118194029.000|CC1|>> YEAH.                        
20110118194029.000|20110118194035.000|CC1|THIS APPEARS TO BE DIFFERENT    
20110118194035.000|20110118194036.000|CC1|THAT WHAT SEEN IN THE PAST.     
20110118194036.000|20110118194038.000|CC1|THIS ISN'T A COLUMBINE, COLORADO
20110118194038.000|20110118194039.000|CC1|TYPE OF SHOOTING.               
20110118194039.000|20110118194042.000|CC1|THAT IS AN ACTIVE SHOOTING.     
20110118194042.000|20110118194045.000|CC1|THE LESSON FROM COLUMBINE, WE   
20110118194045.000|20110118194046.000|CC1|DON'T HAVE THE LUXURY OF STAGING
20110118194046.000|20110118194047.000|CC1|LAW ENFORCEMENT AND MAKING THE  
20110118194047.000|20110118194049.000|CC1|DECISION WHEN TO GO IN.         
20110118194049.000|20110118194051.000|CC1|WHEN YOU HAVE AN ACTIVE SHOOTER 
20110118194051.000|20110118194053.000|CC1|IN A SCHOOL OR WORKPLACE YOU    
20110118194053.000|20110118194054.000|CC1|TAKE AN LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICER,
20110118194054.000|20110118194056.000|CC1|YOU MOVE IN, AND YOUR WHOLE     
20110118194056.000|20110118194057.000|CC1|OBJECTIVE IS TO KEEP MOVING     
20110118194057.000|20110118194059.000|CC1|UNTIL YOU ENCOUNTER THE SHOOTER 
20110118194059.000|20110118194102.000|CC1|AND STOP HIM FROM SHOOTING, EVEN
20110118194102.000|20110118194104.000|CC1|IF YOU FIND INJURED PEOPLE YOU  
20110118194104.000|20110118194105.000|CC1|HAVE TO KEEP MOVING BEYOND.     
20110118194105.000|20110118194108.000|CC1|IT APPEARS THIS WAS A LIMITED   
20110118194108.000|20110118194109.000|CC1|SCENARIO, THOUGH ONE TO THREE   
20110118194109.000|20110118194112.000|CC1|PEOPLE SHOT IS A BAD SITUATION.
